Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This parrot, over two feet in height from top to tail, is covered almost entirely in $(this.trait:colorone) feathers. The tail, wings and ornately crested head are accentuated by longer feathers that are $(this.trait:colortwo) in color. The feet are muted grey in color, matching the dull grey color of the large, curved beak. Beady black eyes are set above this beak.

This parrot, over two feet in height from top to tail, is covered almost entirely in $(this.trait:colorone) feathers. The tail, wings and ornately crested head are accentuated by longer feathers that are $(this.trait:colortwo) in color. The feet are muted grey in color, matching the dull grey color of the large, curved beak. Beady black eyes are set above this beak.
The large curved beak of the parrot is dull grey in color.
Set above the curved grey beak, these Brady black eyes dart to and fro with animated ease.
The body of the parrot is covered in $(this.trait:colorone) feathers while the head, tail and wings are accentuated by feathers that are $(this.trait:colortwo) in color.
The parrot's feet are dull grey in color, the small curved claws working to keep the creature perched securely when not in flight.
The parrot's head is topped by ornately crested $(this.trait:colortwo) feathers.
The parrot's long tail feathers are colored $(this.trait:colortwo) and about eight to twelve inches in length.
The wings of the parrot are almost three feet in wingspan when outstretched and covered in $(this.trait:colortwo) feathers.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "Once you name the parrot, it will consider you its master. It will respond to the control command."
